channel.title: CVE Feed for HelpieWP -- Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HelpieWP -- Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-47647|2024-10-07T14:13:16.282Z -- helpiewp -- accordion%20%26%20faq%20%E2%80%93%20helpie%20wordpress%20accordion%20faq%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HelpieWP Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin: from n/a through 1.27.
